state

Class StateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • state.StateManager

  • public class StateManager
extends Object
    public class StateManager
    This class contains all the possible states, and manages them, by calling the method setCurrentState(State)
    Author:
    Branko Vitorovic, Teodora Mladenovic

    • Constructor Detail

      • StateManager

        public StateManager(Canvas canvas,
                    WorkFrame workframe)
        This is default constructor for the StateManager
        Parameters:
        canvas - an Canvas (JPanel), which StateManager will be managing.
        workframe - an Workfame which, contains canvas and toolbar, that StateManger will be managing.

        public void setCurrentState(State newState)
        This method sets the current State.
        Use example: setCurrentState(manager.getSelectState())
        Parameters:
        newState - an newState which will be set as current state.
